H0.text: Which British Cathedral has three spires. Norwich Cathedral

H1.text: Which British Cathedral has three spires. Gloucester Cathedral

H2.text: Which British Cathedral has three spires. York Minster

H3.text: Which British Cathedral has three spires. Lichfield

A4.text: The three spires are often referred to as the 'Ladies of the Vale'.

A5.text: The central spire is 77 m (253 ft) high and the western spires are about 58 m (190 ft) with the southern spire a little taller than the northern one.
